# Ozem­pic makes list for next round of Medicare drug price ne­go­ti­a­tions

### [Nicole DeFeudis](https://endpoints.news/author/nicole-defeudis/ "See all stories by Nicole DeFeudis")

#### Senior Reporter

No­vo Nordisk’s block­buster GLP-1 prod­ucts Ozem­pic and We­govyare among the next 15 drugs sub­ject to the gov­ern­ment’s Medicare ne­go­ti­a­tion pro­gram un­der the In­fla­tion Re­duc­tion …
